mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine (machine_id, machine_code, machine_version, machine_name, machine_type_cd, machine_ip, machine_mac,oem,ext_machine_id,community_id,hm_id,location_type,location_obj_id,heartbeat_time,direction,third_machine_id) VALUES (#{machineId}, #{machineCode}, #{machineVersion}, #{machineName}, #{machineTypeCd}, #{machineIp}, #{machineMac},#{oem},#{extMachineId},#{communityId},#{hmId},#{locationType},#{locationObjId},#{heartbeatTime}, #{direction},#{thirdMachineId})
mapper.update:
update machine t
t.machine_id = #{machineId},
t.machine_code = #{machineCode},
t.machine_version = #{machineVersion},
t.machine_name = #{machineName},
t.machine_type_cd = #{machineTypeCd},
t.machine_ip = #{machineIp},
t.machine_mac = #{machineMac},
t.status_cd = #{statusCd},
t.oem = #{oem},
t.ext_machine_id = #{extMachineId},
t.hm_id = #{hmId},
t.heartbeat_time = #{heartbeatTime},
t.location_type = #{locationType},
t.location_obj_id = #{locationObjId},
t.third_machine_id = #{thirdMachineId},
t.direction = #{direction},
where 1=1 and t.status_cd = '0'
and t.machine_id = #{machineId}
and t.community_id = #{communityId}
and t.ext_machine_id = #{extMachineId}
